import React, { useState } from "react"; import NetflixModal from "./NetflixModal" import SearchResults from "../SearchResults" import { ThemeProvider, Modal, Container, Row, Col, Button, Text, Icon, Anchor, Image } from "atomize"; function WatchingTitles() { const [modal, setModal] = useState(false) const [showComponent, setShowComponent] = useState(false) const onButtonClick = () => { setShowComponent(!showComponent) } return( WATCHING NOW setModal(true)}> ADD A TITLE YOU'RE WATCHING NOW setModal(false), setShowComponent(true) } />

{showComponent ? <> : <> You currently have no titles. Add a title you're watching now. }

) } export default WatchingTitles;
